triples.name: Graph isomorphism
triples.relevance: The paper addresses the computational problem of graph isomorphism for symmetry reduction in state spaces.

triples.name: Symmetry reduction
triples.relevance: The paper proposes using isomorphism checking as an effective technique for symmetry reduction in graph-based state spaces.

triples.name: State space (computer science)
triples.relevance: The method is applied to graph-based state spaces to reduce computational complexity.

triples.name: Hash function
triples.relevance: The paper uses certificate-based hash keys to store and recognize graphs in previously computed sets.

triples.name: Graph theory
triples.relevance: Graph theory provides the mathematical foundation for the isomorphism checking and certificate mapping techniques.
